holidays.title: International NFT Day
holidays.description: Creating digital expressions and ownership like never before!

holidays.title: National Pepperoni Pizza Day
holidays.description: Pepperoni and pizza, a deliciously mouth-watering, gooey combo right out of pizza heaven!

holidays.title: National Queso Day
holidays.description: A delicious cheese dip that finds a home in a great deal of Tex-Mex cooking.

holidays.title: German World Children's Day
holidays.description: The official children’s day of Germany, one of two children’s days recognized in Germany every year.

holidays.title: National Care For Kids Day
holidays.description: A successful community is one that provides healthcare, education, and emotional care to its children.

holidays.title: National Crime and Intelligence Analyst Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Take a minute to learn about the importance these professionals play in combating crime!

holidays.title: National Dog Week
holidays.description: Dogs have been our companions for thousands of years, it’s time to repay their loyalty!

holidays.title: National Fried Rice Day
holidays.description: Fulfill your inner cravings with this amazing dish as we celebrate Fried Rice Day.

holidays.title: National IT Professionals Day
holidays.description: They make sure our computer systems run smoothly.

holidays.title: National Punch Day
holidays.description: It's not really soda, not really juice and not completely a cocktail.

holidays.title: National String Cheese Day
holidays.description: Join the foodie bandwagon as this snack strings you along to culinary bliss.

holidays.title: ​National Voter Registration Day
holidays.description: National Voter Registration Day brings Americans together over our mutual love of democracy.

holidays.title: Ellie Louise’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ellie Louise is amazing because of her positivity and fitness — we're proud of her achievements!

holidays.title: Jack Hemmings’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jack Hemmings made a name for himself — he’s destined to do much more!

holidays.title: Katrina Stuart’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented singer, actress, and model the sky is the limit.

holidays.title: Khabib Nurmagomedov’s Birthday
holidays.description: This mixed martial arts fighter’s record-breaking career remains unmatched to this day.

holidays.title: Yung Joc’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper has faced many controversies throughout his career, but he is very resilient.
